scripts.prebuild: pnpm run clean && mkdir -p dist/chrome/options dist/firefox/options
scripts.build:assets:chrome: cp src/manifest.chrome.json dist/chrome/manifest.json && cp src/options/options.html dist/chrome/options/options.html && cp -r src/icons dist/chrome
scripts.build:assets:firefox: cp src/manifest.firefox.json dist/firefox/manifest.json && cp src/options/options.html dist/firefox/options/options.html && cp -r src/icons dist/firefox
scripts.build: pnpm prebuild && pnpm build:chrome && pnpm build:firefox
